nodes.bodyText: Confirming: does the reactRouteData store get cleared with an empty object when you navigate away from the React routes? Or will this potentially contain stale data from the most recent route? Probably won't be a problem here..
This will contain stale data when navigating away. Once a react route is engaged again the data in the store will be completely replaced.
